name: Survey Updates
description: This is a utility EM which takes a repeating form and updates a non-repeating form. The most common use for this EM will be for participants to update their contact info in surveys and have that new info populate a Demographics instrument so the Demographics instrument is always up-to-date.

project-settings.name:
Update a non-repeating form with data from a repeating form
The most common use case for this EM is when projects send out surveys to particpants where they would like the participant's contact information updated. Instead of searching through repeating forms for the last time participants updated their contact info, this utility will update fields on a non-repeating form (such as a demographics form) so the non-repeating form always has current information. Fields that are left blank on the repeating form will not overwrite fields in the non-repeating form unless the 'overwrite' checkbox is checked.

sub_settings.name: Form name which holds the new data to be saved (repeating)

List of fields to save in another form
Comma separately list of fields
Event id of the form to be updated

List of fields to update
A comma-separated list of fields to update. Order must match repeat-fields

When checked, force an overwrite
Data from the repeating forms will only overwrite data on the non-repeating form if there is data entered on the repeating form. If there is no data in a field, the data in the non-repeating form will not get overwritten. When this checkbox is checked, the data in the repeating form will always overwrite the data in the non-repeating form even if it is blank.
